text: Shuja Khanzada (; 28 August 1943 â€“ 16 August 2015) was a Pakistani politician and retired Pakistan Army colonel. He served as the home minister of Punjab from 2013 until his death in 2015. On August 16, 2015, Khanzada was killed by a suicide attack at his political office in Shadikhan; the militant group Lashkar-e-Jhangvi has claimed responsibility. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Politicians from Punjab, Pakistan Category:Pakistani military people
title: Shuja Khanzada
